data.text: Great location to explore the city. Family room was really spacious. Excellent breakfast included in our stay. The rooftop pool was lovely to get a dip in while enjoying some sun. The staff were very welcoming and I would return to this hotel if staying in Barcelona again.
data.title: Great stay

Dear Climber, 

We kindly appreciate you for sharing your experience with us. Your comment will be taken for our improvment. 
We hope to welcome you soon. 

Regards from all the staff, 

Hotel Catalonia Gran Via BCN
owner_response.author: Hotel Catalonia Gran Via BCN

data.text:
Lovely hotel extremely handy and delightful staff-totally recommend this hotel on a break to the lovely city of Barcelana -additionally it is surrounded by some lovely (non tourist) restaurants.
One not be sureyour taxi driver delivers you to this hotel not others with a similar name
data.title: Great Hotel

data.text: Best location (2-3 min from metro & great culinary center San Antoni is behind), wonderful staff and great facility. Nicely built in an old building. The view from the balcony was wonderful, looking down the beautiful streets and nearby old buildings. In the room it was very practical to have wc and shower divided. And the warm staffs made our trip very welcoming and happy. Overall 5 out of 5. We will definitely come back in the future.
data.title: Best located hotel in BCN

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 

Thank you for review our hotel and for giving us this perfect rating. We are delighted to know your stay was fantastic and we would like to welcome you again. 

Best regards from all the satff.
owner_response.author: Hotel Catalonia Gran Via BCN

data.text: Stayed at the Catalonia Gran Via BCN for one night, pre cruise, at the end of November 2023. The airport bus stops very close to the hotel (2nd stop from the airport), so it was just a five minute walk to the hotel.  On arrival we were greeted by very friendly staff and offered a glass of cava in the hotel bar.  Our room, with balcony, overlooked the road to the front of the hotel but with the doors closed it was very quiet. The room was very well furnished and the bed was comfortable. The soft furnishings and linen, towels etc were all of high quality. The walk in shower was great. The only downside was that there was no tea/coffee/kettle in the room which was odd as we saw the provisions on the cleaner's trolley and noticed that the room next door did have this facility. A bottle of water was provided. We would definitely stay again and highly recommend the hotel.
data.title: Highly recommended

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear guest, thank you for review our hotel and for giving us this perfect rating. We are delighted to know your stay was fantastic and we would like to welcome you again. Best regards from all the satff.
owner_response.author: Hotel Catalonia Gran Via BCN

data.text:
Very nice, cozy hotel with spacious rooms and the perfect location! As someone who lived in Barcelona, I would definitely recommend staying at this part of the Grand Via, because from here it is so easy to get around by walking, but also buses and metro lines are very close. 
The staff was also very kind and helpful at the hotel!
data.title: Spacious rooms and wonderful location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Esterr, thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are delighted to hear you have liked the rooms and the hotel's location. Our staff strive every time to try to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Regards from all our team.
owner_response.author: Hotel Catalonia Gran Via BCN
